initialize(address[],uint256[]).details: Can only be called once via the initializer modifier.

params._payees: Array of addresses to receive payments
params._shares: Array of relative weights for each payee

initialize(address[],uint256[]).notice: Initializes the contract with payees and shares

release(address).notice: Releases accumulated ETH for a specific account

releaseERC20(address,address).notice: Releases accumulated ERC20 tokens for a specific account
